entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to by his first name.

entities.name: witch
entities.description: An aged witch who is holding a tray of human fingernails and leering at Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The Hogwarts gamekeeper with beetle-black eyes and a great bristling beard.

entities.name: gringotts bank
entities.description: A snow-white marble building in the distance.

relationships.description: Hagrid knocks the tray out of the witch's hands and pulls Harry away from her.
Hagrid rescues Harry from the witch.
